name: Fruit Catcher (El Luminoso)
description:
Here is a little game I made with free assets. I planned  to make a game of 100 levels, so there's a lot to come. Now I will tell you basic things:

Controls :

Movement:  WASD or use the arrow keys.  

Jump: Space bar

Pause the game: Esc key 

Try it and have fun.

Music by Bit Bert.

Music by Abstraction.  http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

Assets from Pixel Frog' Pixel Adventure assets.
